random_names.intro: How do you feel about these names?

search_preset.popularGirlNames: Popular names for girls and women
search_preset.popularBoyNames: Popular names for boys and men
search_preset.unusualNames: A bit unusual names starting with {name}
search_preset.intro: How about starting with one of these lists?

explore_link.sentence: ...or search for something else on the {link}.

about.title: About
about.paragraph_1: This pages makes it easier for you as expecting parents to find a name for your baby.
about.paragraph_2: The idea is to make it easier for you to find a name both of you like. Each parent signs in and votes for their favourites and then you will see your shared favourites.
about.paragraph_3: The service is free to use.
about.paragraph_4: The service is provided and developed by Mikael Svensson.

privacy_policy.link: Information about how personal data is handled

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.subtitle: What this site does and does not.

section_1.heading: How Your Data Is Used
section_1.paragraph_1: For privacy reasons, we save as little data about you as possible. We store just enough data to provide you with the site's functionality.
section_1.paragraph_2: Some examples what what we don't use your data for:
section_1.example_1: we do not send your data to other organizations,
section_1.example_2: we do not store your credentials or other sensitive data.
section_1.example_3: we do not use your data to show ads,
section_1.example_4: we do not send you marketing emails,

section_2.heading: Get a Copy of Your Data
section_2.paragraph_1: If you want to request a copy of data we have about you, then send your request to namn@mikaelsvensson.info.

section_3.heading: Delete Your Data
section_3.paragraph_1: If you want to delete your account, including all your votes, then send your request to namn@mikaelsvensson.info.

login_email.sending_link: We're sending a link to you...

check_inbox.sentence: {strong_1} to find the mail we just sent you. {strong_2} to log in.
check_inbox.strong_2: Then click the link in the mail

login_email.wait_a_few_minutes: You can try again if you haven't received the email in a few minutes.

error.paragraph_2: We couldn't send you the log-in link.
error.paragraph_3: Please try again in a few minutes.

instructions.sentence: You'll get a {strong_1} when you want to log in. Click the link to log in. {strong_2}

explore.no_filters_note: Use the search field and buttons above to find names.

paragraph_2.sentence: {save_name_link}. Only you and your partner will see this name.
paragraph_2.save_name_link: Save {name} as a name you like

favourites.title: He you'll see your favourite names.

empty_list.mine: You haven't voted on any favourite names yet.
empty_list.ours: You don't have any favourites in common yet.
empty_list.not_voted_yet: No new to vote on. You have voted on all names your partner has voted on.
empty_list.all: Neither you nor your partner has voted on any names yet.

gender_description.male: More than 90% of people with this name are men.
gender_description.female: More than 90% of people with this name are women.
gender_description.unisex: Both men and women have this name.

list_item.login_message: You must log in to vote.

name.login_message: You must log in to vote.

perform_action.success_add_relationship: You can now see each others favourites.
perform_action.error_already_used: This one-time link has already been used once.
perform_action.error_no_action: Our bad. We made a mistake and something went wrong.

delete_data_request_status.body: You have requested that we delete the data we have received abouut you from Facebook. This includes your username, and you will not be able to log in if we delete that. Since you will not be able to log in after that we will also delete the your votes and names. Please confirm that you are aware of this.
delete_data_request_status.button: Yes, delete my profile on Names
delete_data_request_status.success: We've deleted all your data from the system. Welcome back.

recommendations.title: Suggestions based on your votes
recommendations.subtitle: Basd on your favourites
recommendations.need_more_votes: When you've voted for all ten you get ten more.

share.subtitle: Link your profiles to see each others favourites.

send_link.heading: Option 1
send_link.instructions: Copy this link and send it to your partner:

scan_qr.heading: Option 2
scan_qr.instructions: Your partner scans this QR code with their phone camera and visits the link that pops up.
scan_qr.note: QR reader is build-in to most, but not all, phone cameras.

profile.title: My profile
profile.partner_connected: Your votes and names are shared with another user.
profile.partner_not_connected: Your votes and names are not shared with anyone else.

delete_account.heading: Delete profile
delete_account.instructions: By deleting your profile you will lose all data on this site, for example your votes.

confirmation.title: Are you sure?
confirmation.confirmation: This is an irreversible operation. You will not be able to recover your data after you delete your profile.

profile_deleted.title: Profile deleted
profile_deleted.body: We've deleted all your data from the system. Welcome back.
